attributes.title: Optimize Performance for Core Web Vitals and Mobile Experience
attributes.description:
Implement comprehensive performance optimizations to achieve target Lighthouse scores and provide exceptional user experience across all devices and network conditions.

**Core Web Vitals Optimization:**
- Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) optimization targeting sub-2.5 second loading
- First Input Delay (FID) minimization through efficient JavaScript execution
- Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) elimination with proper image and content sizing
- Time to First Byte (TTFB) optimization through server-side rendering improvements
- Performance monitoring with real user metrics collection

**Bundle Size and Loading Optimization:**
- Code splitting implementation for optimal chunk loading
- Tree shaking configuration to eliminate unused dependencies
- Dynamic imports for non-critical functionality
- Preloading strategies for critical resources and user journey optimization
- Service worker implementation for efficient caching and offline functionality

**Image and Media Optimization:**
- WebP format implementation with fallback support
- Responsive image sizing with proper srcset configuration
- Lazy loading for below-the-fold content
- Critical path image preloading for above-the-fold content
- Compression optimization balancing quality and file size

**Mobile Performance Enhancement:**
- Touch interaction optimization for mobile devices
- Viewport configuration for optimal mobile rendering
- Font loading optimization with proper display strategies
- Critical CSS inlining for faster initial render
- Progressive enhancement ensuring functionality across device capabilities

**Monitoring and Continuous Optimization:**
- Performance budget establishment with automated monitoring
- Lighthouse CI integration for regression prevention
- Real user monitoring with performance alerting
- Regular performance audits with optimization recommendations
acceptance_criteria: Lighthouse Performance score consistently above 90 on mobile and desktop
Core Web Vitals pass Google's thresholds for all critical pages
Page load times under 2.5 seconds on average mobile connection
Bundle size remains under 200KB for initial page load
Mobile user experience provides smooth interactions and navigation
Performance monitoring provides early warning for regressions
